snippet: Los Angeles Clippers guard Chris Paul will miss three to five weeks after separating his right shoulder in a game against Dallas....

headline.print_headline: Clippers' Paul Out 3-5 Weeks With Shoulder Injury
headline.main: Clippers' Paul Out 3-5 Weeks With Shoulder Injury

lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Clippers guard Chris Paul will miss three to five weeks after separating his right shoulder in a game against Dallas.
